website_summaries.verdict: With superior options available at the same midrange price point, this blender is just too average for us to recommend.
pros: With 1,000 watts of power, die-cast metal construction, and a 64-oz
jar, the $199 Cuisinart PowerEdge 1000 Watt Blender has a high-end feel at a midrange price
For basic blending needs, it does the job
cons: The competition does the job better, for the same price or less

customer_reviews.title: Food leaks into bottom of blender. Badly made and unsanitary.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in 2016, and paid $146.99 for it, too. I've used it probably less than a dozen times because I really don't use blenders that much, but my 20 year old one finally broke. Well today I was making enchilada sauce, and noticed after cleaning the blender that there were still food particles below where the blender container is (see pics). I really can't see any way to clean it out without dismantling it, and even then it's almost assured to leak again. $150 down the drain!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Woulda been great if it worked
customer_reviews.text: When I started the blender for the first time, we got a rattling sound, and when we checked the different parts, discovered the motor section rattled when lightly shaken. Trying to return this to Cuisinart for repair or replacement has been a major pain. Had to call twice to get a return label -- don't know yet whether the second call worked because it takes 3-5 business days to get a label by email. Hard to believe in this day and age, but there it is. I've used Cuisinart products before and loved them so I'm hoping one day to be able to mix and blend with confidence. For now I'm out of luck and waiting...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pick something else.
customer_reviews.text: I hate this blender. I've been using it for a few years. In the beginning, it occasionally leaked from the bottom if I didn't REALLY tighten the base. As time has gone on, it leaks more and more. Now it leaks all the time, no matter how much I try to tighten it before using. It's really awful for an expensive blender. Besides the leaking, it's also ridiculously difficult to clean. Pick something else. Update: I got the Ninja Professional Blender 1000 (BL610) to replace this cuisinart, and I like it MUCH better. Cheaper, easier to use, easier to clean. Get the Ninja!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Carrying liquids a breeze with light yet sturdy container
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and has several different functions! Plastic container makes carrying liquids lighter. Base is heavy duty and stays put for safety.
customer_reviews.author: North Shore Gal

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy This Blender
customer_reviews.text: I rarely use a blender, but needed one for occasional use. Bought this in 2012 and used it about a dozen times. Brought it out of pantry yesterday, plugged it in and it made a "click" sound and that was it. Dead. Don't even go to the trouble of considering this product. Cuisinart should be ashamed to even sell it and this experience guarantees that I won't buy another Cuisinart product again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this blender
customer_reviews.text: The nutrabullet is way but way more powerful than this blender... I cook every day even weekends and i get upset that even if i chop my ingredients it doesnt blend and i have to be taking almost everything out again and chopping it more. My nutrabullet its small unfortunatly but i dont chop nothing and it blends to suberp perfection.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette E. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service .. I wonder if they have such a thing!
customer_reviews.text: Just received the blender yesterday. Reading instructions I discovered there was no RUBBER GASKET. After 2 phone calls to their customer service and waiting on hold for over 40 minutes I was told to contact the company I purchased it from. Were they not able to send me a rubber gasket? Probably not .. likely the rubber gaskets are in China. I have always valued Cuisinart products but was so disappointed with their customer service that I will not be purchasing anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Mason

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace an old blender. Works well so far. The motor/base unit is fairly large but fortunately fits in our pantry cabinet when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfgang Liebelt

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, but flawed
customer_reviews.text: Powerful blender. Works well, but the o-ring is very difficult to get out when you go to clean it. I have to use a tooth pick to dig it out. Also, it was hard to make sure the base was on tight enough and I often ended up with leaking out the bottom. Very hard to clean when this happens. I bought a Nutri-Bullet last year and much prefer it to the blender. Now it just sits in the cupboard and I am thinking of giving it away.
customer_reviews.author: S. Weum

customer_reviews.title: Frozen Margaritas... Oh yea!
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful blender and awesome for making frozen margaritas! I bought this as a Christmas gift for one of my adult children and I am actually considering getting rid of my Margarittaville Machine to get this!
customer_reviews.author: Lorie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect EXCEPT ......
customer_reviews.text: This blender is perfect EXCEPT for the O Ring. It is both necessary and difficult to remove for cleaning. OTHER than that it is a GREAT blender. We use it mostly for Smoothies made with frozen fruit. I made 3 cups in 30 seconds and it was perfect. The auto pulse worked great. I will see if I can post pics of both o-ring and finished smoothie.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Powerful but inefficient
customer_reviews.text: Although powerful, the blender we received almost liquified the food at the bottom and left the rest unblended. It took much poking and shaking to get the soft, cooked good properly blended. The same amount of food that is normally handled in one go by our much smaller blender.
customer_reviews.author: Lightning

customer_reviews.title: You can do better
customer_reviews.text: The top of this blender is hard to fit into the picture. It doesn’t fit under the counter by like a half of an inch. And it really doesn’t make a smoothie without you constantly stopping in mixing it by hand. No better than my KitchenAid and I bought this as an upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Octavia

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing + failures
customer_reviews.text: This blender has gotten pretty moderate, even low, use in our kitchen, but after a while the jar became crazed (hundreds of tiny cracks on or in the plastic, though it remains intact and doesn't leak). Worse, a few years in it now makes a terrible buzzing sound when plugged in (an internal short? faulty buttons?). Clearly it's reached the end of its rather easy life, and we will not buy another Cuisinart blender. Beyond those product failures, it's just not that great a blender, and the lid tends to leak, especially when blending hot liquids. Most definitely not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: bmisf

customer_reviews.title: Great Blender
customer_reviews.text: We use this daily and so far have no complaints. My only piece of advice is to not remove the blade every time you clean it. It can be a pain and you have to be careful to not lose the seal. We misplaced ours once and it leaked like crazy. Which, was totally our fault. But to avoid possibly losing the seal, I wouldn't remove the blade at every cleaning. Great product and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Oplotnik

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, well built, very good looking model. Great for mixed drinks at the bar, crushing ice for poolside.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Not worthy it
customer_reviews.text: I have had this blender for only about 9 months. The pulse button already broke. I am not happy at all with this blender. I find it very difficult to unscrew the bottom part in order to clean it, as the plastic from the blender cup goes around it. I find it difficult to take out the very thin rubber to wash it. I find it difficult to measure 1 cup, because its mark on the blender is kind of weird. I always have to lift up the cup to make sure I have the right mark, when I need a more precise measurement. I do not think this expensive blender is any better than any of cheaper brands.
customer_reviews.author: Juju

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and powerful. I think this carafe is bigger ...
customer_reviews.text: Quiet and powerful. I think this carafe is bigger than the one with the next size up motor.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Horror first experience!
customer_reviews.text: First time I used this brand-new blender to whip up a strawberry smoothie, a slew of chewed-up, match head-sized fragments of black plastic spewed from the bottom of the motor and a smell of burning plastic filled my kitchen as the machine clunked noisily through the 'blending' process. Clearly, something hadn't been properly assembled in the motor and I consider myself lucky that the plastic shrapnel was the worst of my experiences. Amazon has offered to replace the item which I'm prepared to do on the hope that this one machine was a lemon and that the next one will work. We'll see...
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well but you have to make sure you allow adequate blending time for harder foods such as leafs. Easy to clean-up. There are more powerful products out there but they are also twice as expensive. This is quite suitable for what we use it - mainly fruit and green smoothies. Arrived quickly in perfect condition - thanks Amazon! Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Stop working after only six months.
customer_reviews.text: It seems that after only six months, my blender decided to stop working for no reason. I gave this product a two-star rating because it did a great job at first, but I did not expect it to stop functioning so soon.
customer_reviews.author: Juan A.

customer_reviews.title: The best blender for the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works better than advertised. My morning smoothie is so thick after blending I need a spoon to eat it!!!! This blender doesn't smell and makes quick work at anything you throw at it!!!! I would highly recommend it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: RESJ

customer_reviews.title: Not for the raw and vegan drinkmaker.
customer_reviews.text: I owned this for 6 months when the shaft came loose from the clutch that turns the blades. Not on the jar, but the motor. You pay shipping to and from Cuisinart for repairs. I bought a Ninja now.
customer_reviews.author: Franbugs

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Spend up and buy a Vita-Mix, a superior, multi purpose machine. The Cuisinart could barely produce an acceptable smoothie when run for 2-3 minutes. Forget juicing whole fruits and the vegetable chopping that the Vita-Mix can do in 30 seconds
customer_reviews.author: Linda L. Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Best blender ever!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at what seemed to be a million blenders. I do a lot of vegan and raw foods but I didn't want to spend upwards of $400. I love this blender! It has handled everything I hoped it would, including frozen fruits for smoothies. It is very quiet for a blender. I like the die-cast base, the simple controls (who really needs 14 settings?), and the pulse setting. The only minor flaw is the difficulty in getting out the last 1/4 cup of whatever I've made. Overall, I very much recommend this blender.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy

customer_reviews.title: Great blender. Chops spinach in smoothies very well
customer_reviews.text: Great blender. Chops spinach in smoothies very well, no chunks. The alarm letting you know it is done is very loud (could be pro or con) and doesn't stop until you press the button.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Nice and powerful motor
customer_reviews.text: Nice and powerful motor! Large capacity container! Easy to clean! I make my power green smoothies everyday with this blender and I have no problems!
customer_reviews.author: Danny B.

customer_reviews.title: The life time warranty.
customer_reviews.text: I love this blender...like all cuisinart products have a very good reputation. Everything in my kitchen is from cuisinart. I would not buy any other brands.
customer_reviews.author: ALEX

customer_reviews.title: Powerhouse blender
customer_reviews.text: Great price from amazon . the blender chews through all sorts of hard items like parsnips which were stalling my other blender. Attractive and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: William R. Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: It works well, EXCEPT....
customer_reviews.text: It's okay, but it leaks at the gasket where the blades meet the hopper. It makes it a pain to clean, as well since the contents of the hopper seep into that space... If the gasket worked better, it would be a five star...
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Blender
customer_reviews.text: I have had several blenders in my married life of over 40 years, and this one tops anything I have ever owned. It is quiet, easy to clean, fast, easy to use. But, then every Cuisinart appliance I have in my kitchen is the best!
customer_reviews.author: Bluebonnet

customer_reviews.title: leaks
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this blender for my mom. While visiting I noticed that she wasn't using it. When I asked why she told me that it was leaking. It turns out it had been leaking since I first gave it to her so she just put it away. The contents leak out from the inside bottom and I don't know why. It doesn't seem to be missing anything and no matter how tight we screw the bottom in something leaks out.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: cuisinart power edge
customer_reviews.text: bought this item, nov 29, 2011, because my other cuisinart blender was getting old. i use a blender daily making smoothies. stored the power edge blender until oct 19,2012, and now the motor has started smelling burned. i stopped using product before it started a fire - my last cuisinart lasted 10 years. any item such as this should last more than 5 months.
customer_reviews.author: MEREDITH A. GILES

customer_reviews.title: Lid never fit correctly; was way too big. ...
customer_reviews.text: Lid never fit correctly; was way too big. I could live with that but now the unit won't turn on after 5 months.
customer_reviews.author: Susie B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The smoothie setting works great and that is primarily what we got it for, we love it
customer_reviews.author: Susan H

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this model
customer_reviews.text: The lid does not fit. The rubber ring broke after 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase. I use it frequently and I make ...
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. I use it frequently and I make great mayonnaise with that blender
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Murguia

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed. I have always been a big Cuisinart fan
customer_reviews.text: Bought one year ago. . . was not as powerful as I would expect but it worked for ice smoothies. . . .Today it stopped working. . . of course too late to return. Now I am forced to buy parts to replace parts to try to fix it myself. Really disappointed. I have always been a big Cuisinart fan.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Ridge

customer_reviews.title: I recommend getting it on sale when possible, but it is worth every penny either way!
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected and the plastic is AMAZING. Before this blender I refused to get a plastic pitcher, it had to be glass. After reading a ton of great reviews on the Tritan plastic and researching them I decided I would breakdown and give it a try. I am happy that I did! I have used this blender at least 12 times already and used boiling water in it, put it through the dishwasher etc. and no warping or cloudiness has appeared. It does not even retain the salsa smell/flavor!
customer_reviews.author: Monty Holzworth

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but a great blender.
customer_reviews.text: Little thought must have given when it came to designing the cutter blades installation and removal. It's somewhat difficult unless, as someone said, you have the hand of a chimp. Also a simple two speed blender with a on/off switch would have been sufficient. All in all, it's still the best blender I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: taztaz

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: this blender is awesome...i haven't had any problems and i've had it for about a year.it's super powerful and can handle most things
customer_reviews.author: mm

customer_reviews.title: Love it but it's leaking after a couple of months!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is (or was) a great blender, but has started to leak after just a few months use. It's only used about 3 times a week to make a smoothie. The liquid comes out at the bottom around the grinder on the base. For the price, would have expected better!! Amazon, are you reading this?
customer_reviews.author: Cholmondley

customer_reviews.title: Base Leaks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item because it received such good reviews but I am not satisfied. The base leaks, the plastic parts feel cheap and the settings are pretty useless. I will keep it because I have passed my window for returning it but if I could return it, I would.
customer_reviews.author: J. S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, quality as expected, delivered in time, the product is like in the specifications, I recommend this item if you want quality and durability,
customer_reviews.author: Hernan

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: This blender has proven to be useless. It hardly chops anything substantial and I need to get a new one. This thing can't even handle frozen fruit for a smoothie. Everything gets stuck on the blades and it churns over and over while straining the engine. It also smells when it is on. At first I thought it was because it was a new product, but I've had it for a bit now and the smell still hasn't gone away. Big disappointment, especially coming from Cuisinart.
customer_reviews.author: katarina

customer_reviews.title: Does not blend well AT ALL!!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited when I purchased the blender. However, after receiving it and using it, I returned it. I think that my daughter summed it up best, "It is called a smoothie, not a chunky!"
customer_reviews.author: Tearose

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: As far as I know, the product is perfect, but I unfortunatly couldnt use it because when I plugged it in, it blew. This is because Australia uses different voltage. I should have known this, so it is my fault, so I can't give an accurate review. On Amazon's part thought, it was shipped on time and I'm working order
customer_reviews.author: peter

customer_reviews.title: Great blender
customer_reviews.text: A solid blender that is worth the price. After having a couple cheaper models, I've found my blender. It makes fantastic smoothies and shakes. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: John Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great blender, simply works
customer_reviews.text: Great blender, simply works. It has enough power to blend a thick smoothie in 30 seconds. Only has one flaw: the blade is hard to remove with big hands.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Jones

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Must be sure the bottom is screwed on tight as it will leak if not.
customer_reviews.author: quilt gl

customer_reviews.title: Smoothie King
customer_reviews.text: I researched various products and believed this unit was the best quality for the money. We have had this for about a month and have been very impressed with its power, ease of use, and simplicity in cleaning. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Don L Pickens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and a lot quieter than my old blender
customer_reviews.author: SueZC

customer_reviews.title: Makes a mess doing smoothies
customer_reviews.text: I have a 29$ smoothie maker that puts this one to shame. This makes a mess when using it. Not a reasonable effective product as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: donald g cherms sr

customer_reviews.title: Does not blend fruit well.
customer_reviews.text: Cuisinart CBT-1000 PowerEdge 1.3 Horsepower does not blend fruit well. My $24.00 Hamilton Beach works better than this $199.00 blender.
customer_reviews.author: MotownDiva

customer_reviews.title: great blender
customer_reviews.text: after doing my homework comparing all ratings I could find, this was the best choice for our needs. Wife loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas tinker

customer_reviews.title: two weeks after limited warrantee expired, broke
customer_reviews.text: internal rotor stripped...got three years of good use out of it. only an idiot would pay supposed list price for this.
customer_reviews.author: pbrophy

customer_reviews.title: Love it?  Yes, I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This blender does everything I need it to do! Crushing ice is easy and the special settings make using this blender easy.
customer_reviews.author: P. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Piece of garbage. Underpowered
customer_reviews.text: Piece of garbage. Underpowered. Does not blend well. Can't make smoothies. Bottom completely broke off after 6 weeks. Unable to return it. Amazon sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Blender
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this blender. Works very well. Was also looking at a Vitamix, but like others am trying a different approach before dropping close to $500. Have been using 3x a day for the last 3 days. No problems.....Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mudville

customer_reviews.title: poor rotor design
customer_reviews.text: I make smoothies twice a day. I started noticing a black residue on top of the blender unit. After 3 months, the blade stop spinning because the screw attached to the rotor stripped. So I shipped it back to Cuisinart and I'm wondering if they will get it back to me some time during this lifetime ;-(
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with this blender
customer_reviews.text: Used this blender 4 times before liquid leaked into the electronics. We had to wait for it to dry out before it worked again. For such a brand name it was a disappointment that a liquid would leak so easily into the mechanics. Going to try another brand!!
customer_reviews.author: Hozeman

customer_reviews.title: cuisinart cbt 1000
customer_reviews.text: One of the speeds does not work already. The Smoothy button. I do not like how the lid fits. Overall it does not work the way I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Weight

customer_reviews.title: Not up to Cuisinart Standards
customer_reviews.text: I got this blender after seeing the video making smoothies. This blender makes good smoothies if the fruit is fresh. I tried with frozen strawberries and it did nothing. The motor ran but the fruit was not chopped or mixed. It also does not crush ice. This was such a waste of $199. I think I have waited too long to make a return so I am really upset at this cheap product. I could have gotten a $30 product that did the same thing this one does. DO NOT BUY THIS BLENDER!
customer_reviews.author: high flyer

customer_reviews.title: Happy purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have had my Cuisinart CBT 1000 Blender for about a month now, so easy to use the little lady actually make her own smoothies and blended coffee drinks without having to put down the T.V. remote. Couldn't be happier... with the blender.
customer_reviews.author: honest4u

customer_reviews.title: Think before you buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased at Cuisinart CBT-1000 from Amazon from my address in Australia. On receipt I required an adaptor to fit the standard plugs here. I started it for the first time today -> a BANG, flash AND SMOKE!!! MY FAULT, I DID NOT THINK TO SPECIFY THE 240 VOLTAGE HERE and did not read those details on the specifications. Lesson learnt and hope others avoid this problem. I have no doubt the product was fine.
customer_reviews.author: WVGase

customer_reviews.title: Plastic
customer_reviews.text: The pitcher was plastic and not dishwasher safe. Never used it. Returned it. Do not recommend this blender at all
customer_reviews.author: Lolo

customer_reviews.title: Flawed design. Biggest POS on the market
customer_reviews.text: Leaks all over the place. Do your self a favor and buy a different model. The blending function works excellent BUT the lid does not fit right and the bottom where the blade unit unscrews for cleaning does not seal properly to the pitcher. What a huge letdown. I have tightened the thing so tight that I had extreme difficulty removing for cleaning. Even as tight as you can get it the pictures show the result. Update: 02/04/2020 FAILURE ALERT. I am furious with this crap. Who the f sells this crap.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Too BIG...heavy & tall...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the CBT-1000 based on reviews. This is a BIG machine that I use for big jobs like making batches of muffins. But for smaller jobs like margaritas, quick sauces, etc. I use my more user-friendly Ninja Master Prep Professional (QB 1004) purchased from Amazon for $39.99 + $7.99 shipping. I purchased this based on reviews as #1 choice for making margaritas...fast, very light weight, much easier to clean, perfect ice crushing. Used it for hours during party and everyone love it. I now wish I would have checked out the larger Ninja blenders before purchasing my Cuisinart. It is a good product but the only down-size is that it's heavy and too tall.
customer_reviews.author: D Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Another great product by Cuisinart. As described the blender has a "Powerful 1.3 Horsepower blender with die-cast metal housing, large 64-ounce BPA Free Tritan co-polymer lidded jar with measuring marks. The" preprogrammed Smoothie, Ice Crush, and Pulse functions, and Low and High Speeds" are easy to use with the preset timer for each function. I have many other Cuisinart products and they never disappoint. Also Cuisinart backs all their products. Thank you Cuisinart for another well made and reliable product!!!! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Improved KY Golfer!

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean but not sure it is ideal for smoothies
customer_reviews.text: I read many great reviews about this blenders power but I’m not finding that the case especially with smoothies. Even though it has ice crusher and smoothie power modes, it won’t blend without lots of stopping and stirring. More liquidy concoctions blend better. It is very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as everyone says.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on the rave reviews of how well this makes smoothies. But returned it today. I had to stir the contents from the top so that they would mix. If not, the blades would start to make a smoothie and then just spin on the bottom with chunks of fruit around them. I use frozen fruit for smoothies and I guess it was just too much for it to handle. I really appreciate the Amazon free returns policy. I had been so hopeful about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Cutler

customer_reviews.title: Upgraded!
customer_reviews.text: My first "quality" blender purchase was the Cuisinart CBT-500 SmartPower Premier 600-Watt Blender. On one of my trips home for the holidays I brought it along since it worked great for mixing frozen cocktails... my sister liked it soo much that I decided to let her keep it. So being in the market for a new blender I was ecstatic to come across the CBT-1000. I was captivated by the demo video, clean lines of the mixing jar, and the motor base design! The first thing I did when it arrived was turn ice cubes into "snow"! Looks great, works great. I higly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: BLADE

customer_reviews.title: I think I got a lemon and can't even make lemonade!
customer_reviews.text: We have used the blender only a handful of times and the blades seized up!! It was recommended by a fiend that loves hers. I must have gotten a lemon :(
customer_reviews.author: Susie Craig

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I love my new blender, I use it a lot to make smoothies and to my surprise it has met all my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Blender
customer_reviews.text: Was in the market for a new blender to replace the one we got 46 years ago when we got married . It has so much more power then our old one. It is so easy touse.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: fabulous machine
customer_reviews.text: I agonized over this purchase because I really wanted a Vitamix, but could not afford it. I wanted to begin making green smoothies with it and wasn't sure it would handle the chunks and greens. I cringed the first time I pushed the button. Results? PERFECT!!! I love this machine. I do not understand any of the problems people have reported. It cleans easily, is beautiful and works great. Maybe I will upgrade to a Vitamix someday, but for now I'm perfectly happy. One note..make sure you put the liquid in first and if you use frozen fruit keep the chunks to no bigger than an inch or so.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy M. Gray

customer_reviews.title: A monster
customer_reviews.text: This badboy is POWERFUL. Absolutely monsters through whatever I put in it. Ice, raw veg, frozen fruit, etc. It's loud and fast and I love it. Its vortex isn't as perfect as on the more expensive VitaMix and BlendTec blenders -- sometimes it takes a light shake, or a pause-and-stir, to get the best results. But for the price, it definitely gets the job done well. And it has power to spare. Build quality is excellent; it's solid and heavy. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Wagener

customer_reviews.title: Great looking blender
customer_reviews.text: Great looking blender. Solidly built and works perfectly as well. Extremely pleased about this product and I'm convinced it will give me and my family many years of awesome smoothies and such.
customer_reviews.author: B.L.

customer_reviews.title: The lid does not fit the blender
customer_reviews.text: The lid does not fit. I would like to get a new lid. How can I do that? It is very unusual to have a product with this type of problem!
customer_reviews.author: carita bernard

customer_reviews.title: OMGosh This is the only blender you will ever need ...
customer_reviews.text: OMGosh This is the only blender you will ever need. Period. I make smoothies everyday, even has a smoothly button. Just throw frozen fruit, yogurt, and almond milk in and push the button.. walk away.. In a few seconds it will stop and beep. Your smoothy is ready!
customer_reviews.author: Flying Eagle

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have had my Quizinart blender for 20 years without any problems until the plastic broke around the blades! But it did a lot of blending in 20 yrs! I just ordered its replacement and M very happy with the "smoothy" option. It crushes ice to shavings! I have no complaints. It is easy to clean by putting dish detergent in the pitcher and running on the "smoothy" option I did like the glass pitcher better. But this one is fine. I give it a 5
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Amazed and Very satisifed with this product !!
customer_reviews.text: My Husband was using a Black and Decker Blender he bought 2 months ago for making his Fruity Whey shakes in the mornings, until the Black and Decker burned out. He was looking at Blenders and we found this one, we are amazed, what used to take 3-4 solids minutes of chopping, griding and frappe settings back and forth only take seconds in this blender to smoothie Ice and berries ALL OF WHICH ARE FROZEN. AWESOME BLENDER! Great Purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JMP

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice, but is made cheaply
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice, but is made cheaply. The cord doesn't always fully retract into the base. We use it primarily for smoothies and sometimes it struggles to mix larger items or frozen berries. For the price, I could've bought a more durable option.
customer_reviews.author: Simply Tenders

customer_reviews.title: Cuisinart CBT-1000 Blender
customer_reviews.text: This is a workhorse! I make FROZEN smoothies every day for breakfast, and have returned 2 other blenders from other companies due to the fact they would NOT crush ice or frozen fruit. This has a light jar, easy to clean, hold when full, and pour. If it lasts as long as my previous Waring (42 years) I'd be delighted. GREAT machine and would recommend it highly; it's well worth the extra dollars!
customer_reviews.author: Merry

customer_reviews.title: Great blender for the price
customer_reviews.text: Like this blender a lot, but only wish the container was made of glass not plastic
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Parziale

customer_reviews.title: Every one should have one of these.
customer_reviews.text: This is super cool. I love crushed ice drinks.. got carried away and made snow the other day.. guess it works well :-) I use it to make my home made chipotle sauce, hummus, milkshakes and smoothies. It does everything wonderful and is HUGE! Big is good, I make less batches of sauces, less often :-)
customer_reviews.author: Ross Mackintosh

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I have not had a lot of experience with blenders. I did however read hundreds of reviews on every type of blender out there before purchasing this item. All I have to say is WOW! I love this blender. When I make a smoothie I just put in all of the ingredients, push the smoothie button & walk away. The blender is self programmed to do the rest & beeps when it has completed it's blending cycle. It's quiet, so easy to use, so easy to clean, fits under the cabinets nicely, and & 64-oz jar is a huge plus! Love it! Love it! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Loves Cookies

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Disassemble for Cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Returned it immediately. Very difficult to take apart for cleaning. The problem is that it leaks unless you tighten the blade housing VERY tight. But because the blade housing is inset (encircled with plastic), there is very little room to get your hand inside and get a good grip to loosen the VERY tight blade housing to clean it. Seems like a very poor design. The blender itself may be fantastic, but not being able to disassemble it easily for cleaning is a deal-breaker.
customer_reviews.author: TNJ

customer_reviews.title: Sweeeeet
customer_reviews.text: What a workhorse! Wife has been making smoothies every day almost and using it for so much more. This bad boy does the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Mark M

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: Has not stopped working well for more than 5 years!
customer_reviews.author: Juan E. Criollo

customer_reviews.title: Blender recommendation
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this blender to anyone needing a really good, often used blender. The only annoying feature I have found is the beeping that sounds once it finishes making a smoothie. It won't stop until I go turn it off. I think the cessation of blending would be sufficient to tell anyone "I'm all finished". But, that is a minor annoyance. It cleans easily if you use a spray nozzle. It was definitely worth the money in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn C

customer_reviews.title: Really powerful!
customer_reviews.text: Great blender -- the best I've ever used. A little difficult to get all the goddie out of the jar especially when making pesto -- wish the blade unscrewed and came out. Would be a lot easier. Auto pulse feature is wonderful. Really great blender.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: Can't say enough good things about this blender
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough good things about this blender. We went through two blenders in a short period of time. Each one simply burned out doing normal blender things. This Cuisinart blender is a true workhorse. They don't get any better.
customer_reviews.author: Danny G Watson

customer_reviews.title: Good for Smoothies
customer_reviews.text: This blender is great for making smoothies. It also chops up ice nicely. Overall pretty powerful compared to blenders I've had in the past. It is a fairly large and bulky unit. That's the main reason I didn't give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Zola

customer_reviews.title: high power, high quality
customer_reviews.text: shopped around alot before buying a blender. this was the right one to buy. its very powerful, stylish, seems well built. no complaints. i recommend this blender.
customer_reviews.author: Dan c

customer_reviews.title: great blender
customer_reviews.text: Pulse feature worked great. This replaced an outdated oyster. Crushes ice well. Good seal, easy cleanup. Arrived as promised and on time.
customer_reviews.author: TopGun

customer_reviews.title: A Little Below What I Was Expecting
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent machine. However, it will not power through very think drinks such as a Big Train, or any drink made with ice cream and fruit, plus ice. You have to stop and stir it. Also the lid is very difficult to get fully on. It has the pour end and lift end labeled but it is in tiny print and is black on black. Printing should be white. As is it's very hard to read.
customer_reviews.author: jetjock13

customer_reviews.title: The main reason I purchased this blender was the height ...
customer_reviews.text: The main reason I purchased this blender was the height was listed as 14.62" !! It is in fact 16.5" and does not fit under my counter !!
customer_reviews.author: D. Irmscher

customer_reviews.title: This is a good one
customer_reviews.text: It works much better than our last blender. And it has a big jar to make larger batches. No problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: MsBeach

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: powerful, gets the job done and makes life much easier.
